name: SubSahara
description:
SubSahara is an adventure puzzle game about a diver trapped in mysterious ruins of an ancient Egyptian temple, sunken long ago in the underwater caves of the Congo. To escape, he must unlock the secrets of Set, the god of storms and unravel the history of his life and death.

Left Click to rotate the circles left. Right click to rotate them right. Hold shift to click and drag pieces in and out of the locks. Align the correct pieces and escape before your oxygen tank depletes.
